hostsDialog.hos.info: By default, if a request host is set in the XRAY configuration, it will be used. However, if needed, you can set a custom request host here.
hostsDialog.multiHost: To set multiple addresses, separate them with <badge>,</badge>. A random address will be selected each time.
hostsDialog.wildcard: Use <badge>*</badge> to generate a random string (works for wildcard domains)
hostsDialog.path.info: Set a path for host users, useful behind a reverse proxy.
hostsDialog.port.nfo: By default, the host uses the port declared in the inbound. You can set a custom port if traffic is redirected from a different port. For example, the server might redirect traffic from port 443 to your inbound's default port.

proxyOutbound.info: Additional outbound traffic (only in v2ray custom configuration)

hostsDialog.security.info: If this host's middleware server uses a different security layer than your inbound default, you can set a custom security layer here.
hostsDialog.port.info: By default, the host uses the port declared in the inbound. You can set a custom port if traffic is redirected from a different port. For example, the server might redirect traffic from port 443 to your inbound's default port.
hostsDialog.host.info: By default, if a request host is set in the XRAY configuration, it will be used. However, if needed, you can set a custom request host here.
hostsDialog.host.multiHost: To set multiple addresses, separate them with <badge>,</badge>. A random address will be selected each time.
hostsDialog.host.wildcard: Use <badge>*</badge> to generate a random string (works for wildcard domains)
hostsDialog.sni.info: SNI (Server Name Indication) is used to specify which hostname the client is trying to connect to. This is particularly useful when you have multiple domains pointing to the same IP address.
hostsDialog.echConfigList.info: Encrypted Client Hello (ECH) configuration list. This is a base64 encoded string.

bulk.title: Bulk
bulk.proxySettingsDesc: Configure the proxy settings to apply
bulk.applyToProxyDesc: Select the groups, users, or admins you want to apply proxy settings to
bulk.groupsDesc: Manage group assignments for multiple users and admins at once. Add or remove groups in bulk.
bulk.expireDateDesc: Select the expiration date to apply
bulk.applyToExpireDesc: Select the groups, users, or admins you want to apply expiration date to
bulk.dataLimitDesc: Set the data limit in GB to add or subtract
bulk.groupsOperationDesc: Select whether to add or remove groups from users.
bulk.applyToDataLimitDesc: Select the groups, users, or admins you want to apply data limit to
bulk.dataLimitRequired: Please enter a valid data limit.
bulk.applyDataLimitDescription: Apply the selected data limit to the selected groups, users, and admins.
bulk.confirmApplyDataLimitDescription: Are you sure you want to apply data limit of {{dataLimit}} GB to {{totalTargets}} target(s)? This action will update the data limit for all selected groups, users, and admins.
bulk.proxySettingsRequired: Please select at least one proxy setting (Flow or Method).
bulk.applyProxyDescription: Apply the selected proxy settings to the selected groups, users, and admins.
bulk.confirmApplyProxyDescription: Are you sure you want to apply proxy settings to {{totalTargets}} target(s)? This action will update the proxy settings for all selected groups, users, and admins.
bulk.noTargetsSelected: Please select at least one target.
bulk.groupsDescShort: Select the groups you want to apply
bulk.applyToDesc: Select the user or admin you want to apply settings
bulk.confirmApplyExpireDescriptionAll: Are you sure you want to apply the expiration date {{expireDate}} to ALL users, admins, and groups? This will update the expiration date for everyone.
bulk.confirmApplyExpireDescription: Are you sure you want to apply the expiration date {{expireDate}} to {{totalTargets}} target(s)? This will update the expiration date for all selected groups, users, and admins.
bulk.confirmApplyDataLimitDescriptionAll: Are you sure you want to apply the data limit of {{dataLimit}} GB to ALL users, admins, and groups? This will update the data limit for everyone.
bulk.confirmApplyProxyDescriptionAll: Are you sure you want to apply the proxy settings to ALL users, admins, and groups? This will update the proxy settings for everyone.
bulk.confirmApplyGroupsDescriptionAll: Are you sure you want to apply the group changes to ALL users, admins, and groups? This will update the groups for everyone.
bulk.confirmApplyGroupsDescription: Are you sure you want to apply the group changes to {{totalTargets}} target(s)? This will update the groups for all selected users and admins.
